column1: * 1954 - C.S. Lewis The Gods Return to Earth for Time and Tide.
* 1972 - Richard Jeffery sends a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien (see Letter 347).
* 1982 - The fifth episode of the new version of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 1982 - Mythcon 13 at wikipedia:Chapman University in wikipedia:Orange
* 1983 - Mythcon 14 at wikipedia:Scripps College in wikipedia:Claremont
* 2005 - The Tolkien Societys Tolkien 2005 conference in wikipedia:Birmingham
* 2011 - http://omentielva.com/ Omentielva Cantea - 4th International Conference on J.R.R. Tolkiens Invented Languages in wikipedia:Valencia
